training.value_prop: Don't let your data control you. Design scalable and resilient NoSQL schemas.
training.why_intro: Most developers use MongoDB like a relational database. This is the fatal mistake that kills performance.
pain_points: Why are your queries slow as soon as volume increases?
Why are your indexes not being used as expected?
How to model complex relationships without expensive joins?
